price: 92. « Qu’est-ce donc qui t’a empêché, Aaron, lorsque tu les as vus s’égarer, dit (Moïse à son retour),
arabic: قَالَ يَٰهَٰرُونُ مَا مَنَعَكَ إِذۡ رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ ضَلُّوٓاْ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāhārūnu mā manaʿaka idh ra-aytahum ḍallū
